mapper.select: SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.BIZ_CL , CASE A.BIZ_CL WHEN 'I' THEN 'Internet Using Fee And Others' WHEN 'A' THEN 'CATV Receiving Fee And Others' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DTV Receiving Fee And Others' ELSE 'Mobile Using Fee And Others' END AS RMRK , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BILL_AMT , A.GRP_ID , A.PROD_GRP , A.SVC_GRP , A.PROD_CD , A.SVC_CD , A.CTRT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.SALE_TP , A.CRNCY_CD , A.EXRATE_APLY_DT , A.EXRATE , A.PAY_DUE_DT , A.ATRT_CORP_ID , A.ATRT_EMP_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , A.TAX_TP , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_TP END AS VAT_TP , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_RATE END AS VAT_RATE , B1.VCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_TP END AS SCT_TP , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_RATE END AS SCT_RATE , B2.SCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN C.CUST_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_TP END AS CUST_TP -- 고객유형 , CASE WHEN C.BIZ_REG_NO IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BIZ_REG_NO END AS BIZ_REG_NO -- 사업자등록번호 , CASE WHEN C.CUST_NM IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_NM END AS CUST_NM -- 고객명 , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_TP END AS BUSI_TP -- 업종 , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_CNDT IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_CNDT END AS BUSI_CNDT -- 업태 , C.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR -- 주소 , C.ZIP_CD AS ZIP_CD -- 우편번호 FROM ( SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , MAX(A.USE_YYMM) AS USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , B.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BIZ_CL , SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS BILL_AMT , MAX(A.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID , MAX(A.PROD_GRP) AS PROD_GRP , MAX(A.SVC_GRP) AS SVC_GRP , MAX(A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD , MAX(A.SVC_CD) AS SVC_CD , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , MAX(A.SALE_TP) AS SALE_TP , MAX(A.CRNCY_CD) AS CRNCY_CD , MAX(A.EXRATE_APLY_DT) AS EXRATE_APLY_DT , MAX(A.EXRATE) AS EXRATE , MAX(A.PAY_DUE_DT) AS PAY_DUE_DT , MAX(A.ATRT_CORP_ID) AS ATRT_CORP_ID , MAX(A.ATRT_EMP_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID , MAX(A.CHRG_ITM_CD) AS CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP FROM TBLIV_BILL_TGT_CUST B , TBLIV_BILL_WRK A , TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ C WHERE 1=1 AND C.SO_ID = #{soId} AND C.GUBUN = '2' AND C.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND B.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} -- BILL_YYMM AND B.BILL_CYCL = #{billCycl} -- BILL_CYCL AND B.BILL_DT = #{billDt} -- BILL_DT AND B.SO_ID = #{soId} -- SO_ID AND B.BILL_SEQ_NO = A.BILL_SEQ_NO -- Ã»±¸ÀÏ·Ã¹øÈ£ AND A.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= C.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= C.END_NO GROUP BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , B.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS VAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00021' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS VAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS VCHRG_ITM_CD FROM TPMPD_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_ATTR WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'AT003' ) B1 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B1.CHRG_ITM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS SVAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00100' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS SVAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '06' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS SCHRG_ITM_CD FROM TPMPD_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_ATTR WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'DF064' ) B2 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B2.CHRG_ITM_CD , IFNBRM_CUST_INFO C WHERE A.SO_ID = C.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = C.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID ORDER BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , C.CUST_TP , C.BIZ_REG_NO , C.CUST_NM , C.BUSI_TP , C.BUSI_CNDT , C.TAX_TP , C.ADDR_DTL , C.ZIP_CD

SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.BIZ_CL , CASE A.BIZ_CL WHEN 'I' THEN 'Internet Using Fee And Others' WHEN 'A' THEN 'CATV Receiving Fee And Others' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DTV Receiving Fee And Others' ELSE 'Mobile Using Fee And Others' END AS RMRK , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BILL_AMT , A.GRP_ID , A.PROD_GRP , A.SVC_GRP , A.PROD_CD , A.SVC_CD , A.CTRT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.SALE_TP , A.CRNCY_CD , A.EXRATE_APLY_DT , A.EXRATE , A.PAY_DUE_DT , A.ATRT_CORP_ID , A.ATRT_EMP_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , A.TAX_TP , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_TP END AS VAT_TP , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_RATE END AS VAT_RATE , B1.VCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_TP END AS SCT_TP , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_RATE END AS SCT_RATE , B2.SCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN C.CUST_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_TP END AS CUST_TP -- 고객유형 , CASE WHEN C.BIZ_REG_NO IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BIZ_REG_NO END AS BIZ_REG_NO -- 사업자등록번호 , CASE WHEN C.CUST_NM IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_NM END AS CUST_NM -- 고객명 , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_TP END AS BUSI_TP -- 업종 , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_CNDT IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_CNDT END AS BUSI_CNDT -- 업태 , C.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR -- 주소 , C.ZIP_CD AS ZIP_CD -- 우편번호 FROM ( SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , MAX(A.USE_YYMM) AS USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , B.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BIZ_CL , SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS BILL_AMT , MAX(A.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID , MAX(A.PROD_GRP) AS PROD_GRP , MAX(A.SVC_GRP) AS SVC_GRP , MAX(A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD , MAX(A.SVC_CD) AS SVC_CD , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , MAX(A.SALE_TP) AS SALE_TP , MAX(A.CRNCY_CD) AS CRNCY_CD , MAX(A.EXRATE_APLY_DT) AS EXRATE_APLY_DT , MAX(A.EXRATE) AS EXRATE , MAX(A.PAY_DUE_DT) AS PAY_DUE_DT , MAX(A.ATRT_CORP_ID) AS ATRT_CORP_ID , MAX(A.ATRT_EMP_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID , MAX(A.CHRG_ITM_CD) AS CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP FROM TBLIV_BILL_TGT_CUST B , TBLIV_BILL_WRK A WHERE 1=1 AND B.BILL_SEQ_NO = #{billSeqNo} AND B.BILL_SEQ_NO = A.BILL_SEQ_NO -- Ã»±¸ÀÏ·Ã¹øÈ£ AND A.SO_ID = A.SO_ID GROUP BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , B.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS VAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00021' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS VAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS VCHRG_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'DF055' ) B1 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B1.CHRG_ITM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS SVAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00100' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS SVAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '06' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS SCHRG_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'DF064' ) B2 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B2.CHRG_ITM_CD , IFNBRM_CUST_INFO C WHERE A.SO_ID = C.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = C.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID ORDER BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , C.CUST_TP , C.BIZ_REG_NO , C.CUST_NM , C.BUSI_TP , C.BUSI_CNDT , C.TAX_TP , C.ADDR_DTL , C.ZIP_CD

SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.BIZ_CL , CASE A.BIZ_CL WHEN 'I' THEN 'Internet Using Fee And Others' WHEN 'A' THEN 'CATV Receiving Fee And Others' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DTV Receiving Fee And Others' ELSE 'Mobile Using Fee And Others' END AS RMRK , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BILL_AMT , A.GRP_ID , A.PROD_GRP , A.SVC_GRP , A.PROD_CD , A.SVC_CD , A.CTRT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.SALE_TP , A.CRNCY_CD , A.EXRATE_APLY_DT , A.EXRATE , A.PAY_DUE_DT , A.ATRT_CORP_ID , A.ATRT_EMP_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , A.TAX_TP , A.CLC_WRK_NO , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_TP END AS VAT_TP , CASE WHEN B1.VAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B1.VAT_RATE END AS VAT_RATE , B1.VCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_TP IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_TP END AS SCT_TP , CASE WHEN B2.SVAT_RATE IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE B2.SVAT_RATE END AS SCT_RATE , B2.SCHRG_ITM_CD , CASE WHEN C.CUST_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_TP END AS CUST_TP , CASE WHEN C.BIZ_REG_NO IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BIZ_REG_NO END AS BIZ_REG_NO , CASE WHEN C.CUST_NM IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_NM END AS CUST_NM , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_TP END AS BUSI_TP , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_CNDT IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_CNDT END AS BUSI_CNDT , C.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR , C.ZIP_CD AS ZIP_CD FROM ( SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , MAX(A.USE_YYMM) AS USE_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BIZ_CL , SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS BILL_AMT , MAX(A.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID , MAX(A.PROD_GRP) AS PROD_GRP , MAX(A.SVC_GRP) AS SVC_GRP , MAX(A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD , MAX(A.SVC_CD) AS SVC_CD , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , MAX(A.SALE_TP) AS SALE_TP , MAX(A.CRNCY_CD) AS CRNCY_CD , MAX(A.EXRATE_APLY_DT) AS EXRATE_APLY_DT , MAX(A.EXRATE) AS EXRATE , MAX(A.PAY_DUE_DT) AS PAY_DUE_DT , MAX(A.ATRT_CORP_ID) AS ATRT_CORP_ID , MAX(A.ATRT_EMP_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID , MAX(A.CHRG_ITM_CD) AS CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP , MAX(A.CLC_WRK_NO) AS CLC_WRK_NO FROM IFNBRM_CUST_INFO B , TBLIV_SIMULATION_BILL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CLC_WRK_NO = #{clcWrkNo} AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND B.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND B.PYM_ACNT_ID = A.PYM_ACNT_ID AND B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID GROUP BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , A.CHRG_ITM_CD , B.TAX_TP ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS VAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00021' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS VAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS VCHRG_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'DF055' ) B1 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B1.CHRG_ITM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS CHRG_ITM_CD , ATTR_VAL AS SVAT_TP , ( SELECT SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND SET_ITM_ID = '00100' AND EFT_BGN_YYMM <= #{billYymm} AND EFT_END_YYMM >= #{billYymm} ) AS SVAT_RATE , ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '06' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS SCHRG_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND INACT_DT >= #{billYymm} AND ACT_DT <= #{billYymm} AND ATTR_CD = 'DF064' ) B2 ON A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B2.CHRG_ITM_CD , IFNBRM_CUST_INFO C WHERE A.SO_ID = C.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = C.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID ORDER BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BIZ_CL , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , C.CUST_TP , C.BIZ_REG_NO , C.CUST_NM , C.BUSI_TP , C.BUSI_CNDT , C.TAX_TP , C.ADDR_DTL , C.ZIP_CD

SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.SO_ID , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.BIZ_CL , CASE WHEN C.CUST_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_TP END AS CUST_TP , CASE WHEN C.BIZ_REG_NO IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BIZ_REG_NO END AS BIZ_REG_NO , CASE WHEN C.CUST_NM IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_NM END AS CUST_NM , CASE WHEN C.CUST_NM IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_NM END AS REP_NM , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_TP END AS BUSI_TP , CASE WHEN C.BUSI_CNDT IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.BUSI_CNDT END AS BUSI_CNDT , CASE WHEN C.CUST_TP IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE C.CUST_TP END AS CUST_TP , CASE WHEN C.TAX_TP IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE C.TAX_TP END AS TAX_TP , C.ZIP_CD , A.SPLY_AMT , B.VAT_AMT AS VAT , B.SCT_AMT AS SCT FROM ( SELECT BILL_SEQ_NO , BILL_YYMM , BILL_CYCL , BILL_DT , BILL_MM_TP , SO_ID , PYM_ACNT_ID , BIZ_CL , MAX(CUST_ID) AS CUST_ID , SUM(BILL_AMT) AS SPLY_AMT FROM TBLIV_BILL WHERE BILL_SEQ_NO = #{billSeqNo} AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND CHRG_ITM_CD NOT IN ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND (COMMON_CD = '02' OR COMMON_CD = '06') AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) GROUP BY BILL_SEQ_NO , BILL_YYMM , BILL_CYCL , BILL_DT , BILL_MM_TP , SO_ID , PYM_ACNT_ID , BIZ_CL ) A , ( SELECT CASE WHEN B.BILL_AMT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.BILL_AMT END AS VAT_AMT , CASE WHEN C.BILL_AMT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE C.BILL_AMT END AS SCT_AMT , B.BILL_SEQ_NO , B.SO_ID FROM ( SELECT BILL_SEQ_NO , SO_ID , CHRG_ITM_CD , BILL_AMT FROM TBLIV_BILL_WRK WHERE BILL_SEQ_NO = #{billSeqNo} AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND CHRG_ITM_CD = ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) B LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BILL_SEQ_NO , CHRG_ITM_CD , BILL_AMT FROM TBLIV_BILL_WRK WHERE BILL_SEQ_NO = #{billSeqNo} AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND CHRG_ITM_CD = ( SELECT REF_CODE FROM TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND COMMON_CD = '06' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) C ON B.BILL_SEQ_NO = C.BILL_SEQ_NO ) B , IFNBRM_CUST_INFO C WHERE A.BILL_SEQ_NO = B.BILL_SEQ_NO AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.SO_ID = C.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = C.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID
SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{value} AND INV_ITM_CD = 'IP002'
